Feature: Add Items to Cart from Amazon
Description: As a user, I want to search for various items on Amazon.in and add them to my cart

Scenarios.Scenario: Search and Add Book to Cart

Steps.Description: user is on the Amazon.in homepage
user searches for "Book" in the search box
user selects the first book from the search results
user clicks on the "Add to Cart" button
the book should be added to the user's cart
the cart count should increase by 1

Scenarios.Scenario: Search and Add Shoes to Cart

Steps.Description: user is on the Amazon.in homepage
user searches for "Shoes" in the search box
user selects the first pair of shoes from the search results
user selects the desired size
user clicks on the "Add to Cart" button
the shoes should be added to the user's cart
the cart count should increase by 1
